product_name: REI Basic Packable Sun Hat - Women's
long_description: The REI Basic Packable sun hat is made with loosely woven natural fibers for a stylish look that ventilates well on hot summer days. Wide 4 in. brim shades your neck and face from the sun. Hat is packable, so you can stuff it in a bag before a trip and it will snap back to shape when you're ready to wear it. The REI Basic Packable sun hat has an inner elasticized sweatband that wicks moisture and holds the hat securely in place.
short_description: The REI Basic Packable sun hat is made with loosely woven natural fibers for a stylish look that ventilates well on hot summer days.
